meta.name: Admin Dashboard Optimization
meta.description: Optimize dashboard for admin visibility into parallel swarm execution

tasks.description: Create a real-time task grid view in dashboard_vision.js showing ALL active workers in a compact grid layout. Each cell shows: task ID, status (color-coded), elapsed time, current action. Grid auto-scales based on worker count. Update via SSE/WebSocket.

Add a live log stream panel to dashboard_vision.html. Tail the last 50 lines from grind_logs/ in real-time. Color-code by log level (START=blue, DONE=green, FAIL=red, SKIP=gray). Auto-scroll with pause-on-hover.

Build a task dependency graph visualization. Parse grind_tasks_*.json files, extract phase and dependency info, render as a DAG using CSS/SVG. Highlight completed nodes green, in-progress nodes with rainbow border, blocked nodes gray.

Create a swarm health panel showing: total workers, active workers, tasks/minute throughput, estimated cost/hour, API error rate, checkpoint freshness. Use gauges or sparklines. Poll /api/stats endpoint.

Add keyboard shortcuts to dashboard: 'g' for grid view, 'l' for log view, 't' for tree view, 'space' to pause/resume auto-refresh, 'r' to force refresh, '?' to show help overlay. Display current mode in header.
Implement task filtering and search. Add search box that filters visible tasks by: id, description text, status, phase. Support regex. Highlight matches. Persist filter in URL hash for shareability.
Create an experiments/ browser panel. List recent experiment folders with: timestamp, task count, files created, status (success/fail). Click to expand and see file list. Link to view diffs.
Add a cost breakdown chart. Show cost by: task file, phase, time period. Use simple bar chart or treemap. Data from checkpoint + grind_logs. Update in real-time as tasks complete.
Build a parallel execution timeline view. Gantt-style chart showing when each task started/ended. X-axis is time, Y-axis is worker slot. Color by task file origin. Zoom and pan support.
Create dashboard_server.py endpoints: GET /api/stats (swarm health), GET /api/tasks (all tasks with status), GET /api/logs?tail=N (recent logs), GET /api/experiments (experiment list). Return JSON.
Add WebSocket push for real-time updates. Server broadcasts: task_start, task_complete, task_fail, checkpoint_save events. Dashboard subscribes and updates UI without polling. Fallback to SSE.

Implement a notification system. Toast notifications for: task failures, budget warnings (>80% spent), checkpoint saves, new task files detected. Stack in corner, auto-dismiss after 5s, click to expand.
Create a dark/light theme toggle. Store preference in localStorage. Define CSS variables for both themes. Default to dark. Respect system preference via prefers-color-scheme media query.
Add responsive layout for mobile/tablet viewing. Collapse sidebar on small screens, stack panels vertically, touch-friendly controls. Test at 320px, 768px, 1024px breakpoints.
Performance optimization pass. Virtualize long lists (only render visible items), debounce rapid updates, use requestAnimationFrame for animations, lazy-load heavy components. Target 60fps.
Add an admin command palette. Press Ctrl+K to open. Type commands like 'restart swarm', 'clear logs', 'export stats', 'pause workers'. Fuzzy search command list. Execute via API calls.
